internetSharing-usb-description: Share my Internet connection with a USB-connected device.
internetSharing-wifi-description: Share my Internet connection with Wi-Fi-connected devices.
unplayable-ringtone: The ringtone was not changed because the selected file can not be played on this phone.
findmydevice-signup-description: Find My Device allows you to locate, lock or erase your phone
findmydevice-settings-description: Find My Device allows you to locate, lock or erase your phone from a web site:
findmydevice-active-tracking: Your phone is being tracked by another device through the website.
findmydevice-not-tracking: No devices are actively tracking your phone through the website.
ums-confirm: Enabling USB storage allows another computer or device connected using USB to access files on this phone.
reset-warning-body: Resetting will erase all your data, including any apps you’ve purchased. The phone will be restored to its factory condition. None of your settings or data will be saved.
reset-devtools-warning-body: Resetting will erase all your data, including any apps you’ve purchased. None of your settings or data will be saved. But your phone will have unrestricted developer tools, allowing you to modify and debug system applications.
unreset-devtools-warning-body: Resetting will erase all your data, including any apps you’ve purchased. None of your settings or data will be saved. Your phone will no longer have unrestricted developer tools. You will no longer be able to to modify or debug system applications.
powerSave-explanation: Turning on power save mode turns off the phone’s data, Bluetooth and Geolocation connections to extend battery life. You can still turn these services back on manually.

value: by sharing data about your phone and the way you use it.

wifi-disabled: Turn Wi-Fi on to view available networks.
wifi-sleep-description: Enable to automatically turn off Wi-Fi during sleep to save battery power.

import-certificate-msg: Notice: If you need to import new certificates, please go to "Manage certificates".
networkNotification-expl: Notify me when an open network is available
enter-certificate-name-msg: You can change the nick name or keep the default name.
certificate-deletion-failed-description: This may be due to a storage issue, for example.
certificate-import-failed-description: This may be due to a damaged certificate file, for example.
fullStatus-wps-overlapped: Another WPS PBC AP was found
confirmCallWaitingTitle: Unable to confirm call waiting preferences
confirmCallWaitingDesc: The device is currently unable to communicate with the carrier. Try setting the preference again.
callForwardingSetForbidden: Your operator does not support that operation.
callBarring-passcode-unknown: In case you don't know your passcode, please contact your carrier
fdn-authorizedNumbers-desc: List of numbers that can be called
fdn-explanation1: Restrict which numbers can be dialed from this phone.

message-delivery-reports-details: Request notification of delivery for each message sent
message-read-reports-details: Request read report for each message sent
preferredNetworkTypeAlertErrorMessage: Network type could not be set
operator-turnAutoSelectionOff: Turn automatic selection off to view available operators.
dataConnection-warning-message: Applications will automatically fetch data via data connection when required. Additional data charges may apply.
dataRoaming-warning-message: Depending on your service agreement, extra charges may apply for data when you are in a roaming area.
change-apn-warning-message1: Depending on your service agreement, changing your APN setting may result in extra charges when roaming. Do you want to proceed?
reset-apn-warning-message: This resets the settings to default values. This cannot be undone.
bluetooth-enable-msg: Turn Bluetooth on to view devices in the area.
change-btdevice-name-desc: This name will appear on your other Bluetooth devices
error-pair-pincode: Unable to pair with the device. Check that the PIN is correct.
error-pair-toofast: Unable to pair with the device. Too many requests.
error-connect-msg: Check that the device you’re trying to connect with is still in range and has Bluetooth turned on.
unpair-msg: You are currently connected to this device. Unpairing will also disconnect from it.
hotspot-password-desc: The password must have at least 8 characters.
no-ringtone-app: We were unable to find a ringtone app to manage ringtones!
edge-swipe-navigation-enable-msg: Drag from the left or right edge of the screen to jump between apps.
sim-manager-outgoing-data-description: Data service network and Marketplace payments
cant-disable-simcard-alert: At least one SIM should be activated at a time

search-suggestions-description: The characters you type when entering a search are sent to multiple search providers and will be used to send you search suggestions. Additional data charges may apply when using this feature.

findmydevice-enable-geolocation-descript: To view your device's location, you must enable geolocation tracking.
findmydevice-enable-network: This device is currently offline. Connect to a network and try again.
findmydevice-error: A Find My Device error has occurred.
fxsync-overview: Sign in to sync your history, passwords & more
author: Author
simPinIntro1: A SIM PIN prevents access to the SIM card cellular data networks. When it’s enabled, any device containing the SIM card will request the PIN upon restart.
simPinIntro2: A SIM PIN is not the same as the passcode used to unlock the device.

pinLastChanceMsg: This is your last chance to enter the correct PIN. Otherwise, you must enter the PUK code to use this SIM card.
enterPukMsg: You must enter the Personal Unlocking Key (PUK) code for the SIM card. Refer to your SIM card documentation or contact your carrier for more information.
enterPuk2Msg: You must enter the Personal Unlocking Key (PUK2) code for the SIM card. Refer to your SIM card documentation or contact your carrier for more information.

two: tries left to enter the correct code before this SIM card will be permanently unusable. Refer to your SIM card documentation or contact your carrier for more information.

pukLastChanceMsg: Last chance to enter the correct PUK code. Your SIM card will be permanently unusable if you enter in the wrong PUK code. Refer to your SIM card documentation or contact your carrier for more information.
doNotTrackActions: Tell websites and apps that I do not want to be tracked
allowTracking: Tell websites and apps that I want to be tracked
doNotHavePrefOnTracking: Do not tell websites and apps anything about my tracking preferences
doNotTrack-dt: How Does Do Not Track Work?
doNotTrack-dd1: When you turn on Do Not Track, your device tells every website and app (as well as advertisers and other content providers) that you do not want your behavior tracked.
doNotTrack-dd2: Turning on Do Not Track will not affect your ability to sign in to websites nor cause your device to forget your private information, such as the contents of shopping carts, location information or sign-in information.
confirm-clear-history-desc: Are you sure you want to clear your history? When using your Firefox Account, synced history will also be cleared.
confirm-clear-cookies-cache-desc: Are you sure you want to delete your cookies and cache?
privateBrowsingDetails: Open all external links in new private windows.
trackingProtectionDetails: Protect your browsing activity against potential trackers in all new windows.
browser-privacy-history-desc: Clear your browsing history from this device. When using your Firefox Account, synced history will also be cleared.
browser-privacy-cookies-cache-desc: Delete stored data (such as cookies) from this device. Login information and preferences will no longer be remembered.
storage-details: Photos, videos and music are stored separately from apps. See media storage for details.
default-media-location-msg: Choose where photos, videos, music and downloads are stored by default.
change-default-media-location-confirmati: Changing the default media storage location will affect where all media will be saved by default. Existing data will remain in its current location. Do you want to proceed?
unmount-sdcard-confirmation: You will not be able to access content on the SD card after you unmount it. Do you want to proceed?
format-sdcard-message: This will erase all data stored on your SD card, such as music and photos.
format-sdcard-internal-message: This will erase all data stored on your internal storage, such as music and photos.
ums-partial-support-warning-title: Warning: USB Mass Storage may not work
ums-partial-support-warning-msg-1: USB Mass Storage will only work correctly with an external SD card. If you'd like to be able to access both your internal and external storage, you must use MTP.
ums-partial-support-warning-msg-2: Press "OK" to switch to USB Mass Storage, or "Cancel" to remain in MTP mode.
no-network-when-update: Connect to the Internet to proceed with your update.
retry-when-online: Network is offline. Will check again when the network is online.

value: This is already the latest version of

check-error: There was an error when checking for updates.

bluetooth-snoop-debugging: Bluetooth HCI Sniffing Logs to SD Card
no-ftu: No first time use app found
developer-menu-disabled-warning-msg-1: Developer Mode can't be enabled without the developer menu first being enabled.
developer-menu-disabled-warning-msg-2: Please enable it from Settings > Device Information > More Information > Developer Menu.
enable-full-dev-mode-first-warning-title: Would you like to enable developer mode?
enable-full-dev-mode-first-warning-msg-1: THIS WILL DELETE ALL YOUR DATA AND FACTORY RESET YOUR DEVICE.
enable-full-dev-mode-first-warning-msg-2: THIS WILL DISABLE ALL SECURITY MEASURES ON YOUR DEVICE.
enable-full-dev-mode-final-warning-title: Are you sure you want to enable developer mode?
screenReader-enable-msg: When the screen reader is enabled, your device will provide spoken feedback to assist blind and low-vision users.
screenReader-confirm-description-start: Activating the screen reader will change the way your touch screen works. Touch anywhere to hear the item under your finger, and double tap to activate.
screenReader-confirm-description-stop: Stopping the screen reader will end all speech feedback.
crashReportInfo: Sending Mozilla a report when a crash occurs helps us fix the problem for everyone. Reports are sent over Wi-Fi only.
crash-reports-description-1: A crash report contains some details about the crash and your device, as well as a snapshot of the state of your device when it crashed.
crash-reports-description-2: This may include things like open pages and apps, text typed into forms and the content of open messages, recent browsing history, or geolocation used by an open app.
crash-reports-description-3-start: We use crash reports to try to fix problems and improve our products. We handle your information as we describe in our
feedback-description: Your feedback will help us to improve Firefox OS.
feedback-public-description: The content of your feedback will be public, so please be sure not include any personal information.
feedback-contactyou: Check here to let us contact you from your email.
email-keepprivate: Don’t worry. Your email will always be kept private.
feedback-errormessage-connect-error: Sorry, the system can’t send your suggestion due to a data connection error. Please try again when the issue is resolved.
feedback-errormessage-server-off: Sorry, the system can’t send your suggestion because the server shut down. Please wait a moment and try again.
feedback-errormessage-timeout: Sorry, the system can’t send your suggestion because of a timeout. Please restart and try again.
feedback-errormessage-wrong-email: Sorry, the system can’t send your suggestion because the email address is missing or due to a formatting error. Please use a valid email address and try again.
feedback-errormessage-empty-comment: Sorry, the system can’t send your suggestion because the comment field is empty. Please enter some text and try again.
feedback-complete-msg: Thanks for the feedback! We use it to help create better experiences in future releases of Firefox OS.
feedback-errormessage-unknown-error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
default-support: Please contact your local provider for support.
is-warning-storage-tethering-message: Enabling USB storage will disable USB tethering. Do you want to enable USB storage?
is-warning-tethering-storage-message: Enabling USB tethering will disable USB storage. Do you want to enable USB tethering?
is-warning-tethering-wifi-message: Enabling USB tethering will disable Wi-Fi hotspot. Do you want to enable USB tethering?
is-warning-wifi-tethering-message: Enabling Wi-Fi hotspot will disable USB tethering. Do you want to enable Wi-Fi hotspot?
addon-no-description: This add-on does not include a description in its manifest file.
addon-no-targets: This add-on does not affect any installed apps.
addon-reboot-required: This add-on affected system apps; you must reboot your device to fully disable it.
addon-rename-desc: Change the name of your add-on
addon-obsolete: This add-on is obsolete and does not work.
addon-obsolete-can-delete: This add-on is obsolete and does not work. Please delete it.
achievements-add-on-all-star-description: Use Customizer to create your own add-on
achievements-fab-finder-description: Install an app or add-on from Hackerplace
achievements-content-commander-descripti: Submit an app or add-on to Hackerplace
achievements-sharing-is-caring-descripti: Share your apps and add-ons with the Sharing app
achievements-creative-kind-description: Use Theme Editor to create a new theme
helpImprove: Help us improve our products and services by automatically sending analytics data. Data rates and charges may apply.
basicMetricsExplain: Send app usage and error reports.
enhancedMetricsExplain: Send Basic report plus diagnostic information.
fxsync-empty-account: This account is empty. You need to sync from Firefox, Firefox for Android or Firefox for iOS first and try again here.
fxsync-empty-account-with-trademark: This account is empty. You need to sync from Firefox, Firefox for Android™ or Firefox for iOS first and try again here.
fxsync-error-invalid-account-explanation: You need to activate Firefox Sync on Desktop or Android first and then try again.
You need to activate Firefox Sync on Desktop or Android™ first and then try again.
fxsync-error-no-key-fetch-token-explanat: We found something wrong with your current Firefox Account session.
fxsync-error-offline-explanation: You need to be online to use Firefox Sync.
fxsync-error-unknown-explanation: Sorry for the inconvenience. Please try again later.
